Package ru.rsreu.kuznecovsokolov12.datalayer

Interface MessageDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    OracleMessageDAO
    public interface MessageDAO
    The interface provides methods for interacting with a database table storing information about messages.

    This interface defines methods for retrieving different types of messages, including undeleted, deleted, and all messages for a team. It also includes methods to retrieve messages sent or deleted by a specific user.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.util.List<Message> getAllMessages()
      Retrieves all messages, both deleted and undeleted.
      java.util.List<Message> getAllMessagesForTeam​(Team team)
      Retrieves all messages for a specific team, both deleted and undeleted.
      int getCountDeletedMessagesSendedByUser​(User user)
      Retrieves the count of deleted messages sent by a specific user.
      int getCountMessagesSendedByUser​(User user)
      Retrieves the count of messages sent by a specific user.
      java.util.Map<Message,​java.lang.Integer> getDeletedMessagesForTeam​(Team team)
      Retrieves deleted messages for a specific team along with their deletion counts.
      java.util.List<Message> getMessagesDeletedByNoSelfUser​(User user)
      Retrieves messages deleted by a specific user, excluding self-deleted messages.
      java.util.List<Message> getUndeletedMessagesForTeam​(Team team)
      Retrieves undeleted messages for a specific team.

    • Method Detail

      • getUndeletedMessagesForTeam

        java.util.List<Message> getUndeletedMessagesForTeam​(Team team)
                                             throws java.sql.SQLException
        Retrieves undeleted messages for a specific team.
        Parameters:
        team - The team for which to retrieve undeleted messages.
        Returns:
        A list of undeleted messages for the specified team.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - If a database error occurs.

      • getDeletedMessagesForTeam

        java.util.Map<Message,​java.lang.Integer> getDeletedMessagesForTeam​(Team team)
                                                                  throws java.sql.SQLException
        Retrieves deleted messages for a specific team along with their deletion counts.
        Parameters:
        team - The team for which to retrieve deleted messages.
        Returns:
        A map where keys are deleted messages and values are their deletion counts.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - If a database error occurs.
